entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:02 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 1:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:02 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:02 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:02 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
